statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.UserID) AS RowNo , AA.UserID , BB.UserName , COUNT(AA.ID) AS BookmarkCount FROM dbo.TBookmark AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TUser BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UserID = BB.ID WHERE 1=1
AND BB.UserName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%'
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SortOrder, AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.UserID , AA.MenuID , BB.MenuName , AA.SortOrder
FROM dbo.TBookmark AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TMenu BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.MenuID = BB.ID WHERE AA.UserID = #UserID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName , AA.UserID , AA.MenuID , AA.SortOrder FROM dbo.TBookmark AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TBookmark ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, UserID, MenuID, SortOrder ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #UserID#, #MenuID#, #SortOrder# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TBookmark SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName#
, UserID = #UserID# , MenuID = #MenuID# , SortOrder = #SortOrder# WHERE ID = #ID#
